entry.title: 牛客小白月赛48
entry.summary: 感谢各位的观看 A-孤独的数组 #include<iostream> using namespace std; #include<vector> #include<algorithm> int main() { int n; cin >> n; vector<int>data(n); for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) cin >> data[i]; int flag = 1; for (int i = 1; i < n; i++) { if (__gcd(data[i], data[i - 1]) != 1) { flag = 0; break; } } if (flag) cout << 0 <&l...

entry.title: 2021天梯赛决赛
entry.summary: 感谢各位的观看 L1 1.人与神 #include<iostream> using namespace std; #include<string> int main() { cout << "To iterate is human, to recurse divine."; return 0; } 签到题 2.两小时学完C语言 #include<iostream> using namespace std; int main() { int a, b, c; cin >> a >> b >> c; cout << a - b * c ; return 0; } 签到题 3.强迫症 #include<iostream&gt...
